description: RECOMMENDED. A general description of the pulse sequence used for the scan (i.e. MPRAGE, Gradient Echo EPI, Spin Echo EPI, Multiband gradient echo EPI).
comment: nidm:"pulse sequence" is the relevant class; This definition/term combines the nidm:"acquisition modality" (e.g. "spin echo") with nidm:"acquisition method" (e.g. "echo-planar imaging").
label: PulseSequenceType
